name: Jerry
sentences: Hey Matteo! It's good to see you.
I'm a bit of a pickle.
My abuelita threw a chancla at me when she was angry and I accidentally threw it on the roof in anger.
That made her angrier and I want to make it up to her before she brings out the other chancla.
Could you help me get it from the church roof?

result.name: Jerry
sentences: I should be able to give it to her and make amends if you do!
Let me know any I'll compensate you.

result.name: Jerry
sentences: Oh okay... No worries - I'll figure something out.
